Skill Notes:

Mean: -1 Persuasion

Thief: +1 Athletics (urban climbing)/+1 Stealth (urban)/+1 Thievery
Ugly+: -2 Persuasion
Woodsman: +2 Survival/+2 Stealth (wilds)
Ace: Ignores 2 penalty points on Boating, Driving, and Piloting; may spend Benny to Soak vehicle damage
Acrobat: May reroll Athletics (balance, tumble, or grapple)
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Flight: Uses Athletics for flight maneuvers
Jack-Of-All-Trades: Successful Smarts roll gives d4 (Raise d6) on chosen skill
Mc Gyver: Use Repair to create improvised weapon, explosive, or tool
